pageContext.description: Dimensions: EL 61mm; EW 28.5mm; EB 13.8mm; EDs 25mm; Wt. 27.3 g,Typology: rounded midrib, but with slight angles running down either side; hints of orig. edge bevel close to broken edges.,Condition: main break, perforation, and much of the blade edges dirty and not fresh breaks; perfn. punched through crudely, leaving large internal flange,Attached Material: yellow-brown soil in socket and around perfn.
pageContext.surface: Smooth silky (polished?) grass green p. largely intact, esp. on rev. face; chipped mainly along edges in few places, to pale bluey-green dusty sur.; limited gouging of midribs prob. recent.
pageContext.collection: Merredew, Mr. Tony - private (1981),25 Dartmouth House, Elmwood Road, W. Croydon
pageContext.remarks: Archive: PIF, AFI,PRBAF: DF (S); SI,Ext. RSO/31/7/81; CI,Rec. SN Sept 81,Source Sb. A.
